author: Daniel Villarreal
title: Iowa Woman Drove to Police Station, Asked Officers to Test Her Methamphetamine for Coronavirus, Cops Say
description: While the woman's request might seem odd, police stations around the U.S. have actually been telling meth users that their stashes might be infected with the deadly virus.
content: Shawn Salmon, a 53-year-old woman in Sioux City, Iowa, has been charged with the unlawful possession of a controlled substance after she allegedly drove to the Sioux City Police Department on Sunday afternoon and asked police to examine a bag of methamphetami… [+2798 chars]
